## CountryCodeStoreProvider() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A provider component for the `CountryCodeStoreContext`<!-- -->. Every country code selector must have its own state. When creating a custom component that uses Zustand store for the state, the components of the phone number input must be surrounded in `CountryCodeStoreProvider` tags. The combined Zustand component hides this by using a higher order component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function CountryCodeStoreProvider({ children }: {
    children: ReactNode;
}): import("react/jsx-runtime").JSX.Element;
```
